specSampleHelp: Find data from samples by searching on author-given sample names or name fragments (e.g. 135-834B-22R-2/24-28, PS66-238-49) or by PetDB Sample ID or Sample ID Fragment (e.g. ODP0135-0834B-022R-002/24-28, POLARK20-2-238-049, POLAR).
specRefHelp: Find data from a particular reference by searching on Author Name, Publication Year, Keyword in Title, and/or Journal Name.
setLatLonHelp: Select samples by geospatial coordinates (map search or enter latitude/longitude) and/or water depth.
setGeoSampHelp: Select samples by names of physiographic or geological features (e.g. Lamont Seamounts, East Pacific Rise)
setTecHelp: Select samples by choosing a tectonic setting (e.g. back-arc basin)
setSampCharHelp: Select samples by lithology or sampling technique
setCruiseHelp: Select samples by cruise or expedition or ship.
setPubInfoHelp: Select samples by author, publication, and year of publication or data submission.
setDataAvailHelp: Select samples by the data that are available for the sample, e.g. whole rock major or trace elements, radiogenic isotope ratios, or mineral analyses.
setDataVersionHelp: Set constraints on the data query by date entered into the PetDB database.
step1ResultHelp: Continue your search or review your samples using following buttons. You can also save or retrieve your selection within this session using 'save query' or 'retrieve query' buttons below.
